root.name: Umineko no Naku Koro ni: Portable 1
root.description: OverviewThe first title from the Umineko no Naku Koro ni series of visual novels by 07th Expansion to be released on the PSP, this game is a port of Umineko no Naku Koro ni: Majo to Suiri no Rinbukyoku originally released for the Playstation 3 in 2010. It features the first two episodes of the visual novels, Legend of the Golden Witch and Turn of the Golden Witch.
